text: Owning the outcome beats blaming the market. If you control inputs, you control odds.
Consistency compounds. Miss a day, pay a week. Routines aren’t sexy, they’re leverage.
If your calendar is full of noise, your P&L will whisper. Focus isn’t a quote, it’s a filter.
Price follows proof. Make the win obvious and the sale obvious happens by itself.
You don’t rise to your goals; you fall to your systems. Build rails, not wishes.
